005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.ExternalSource;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.InternalModelSource;
012
013import java.net.URI;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
017
018/**
019 * A descriptor that identifies where a given constraint was defined.
020 */
021public interface ISource {
022  enum SourceType {
023    /**
024     * A constraint embedded in a model.
025     */
026    MODEL,
027    /**
028     * A constraint defined externally from a model.
029     */
030    EXTERNAL;
031  }
032
033  /**
034   * Get the descriptor for a
035   * {@link gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ISource.SourceType#MODEL}
036   * source with as associated resource.
037   *
038   * @param module
039   *          the Metaschema module the constraint was defined in
040   * @return the source descriptor
041   */
042  @NonNull
043  static ISource modelSource(@NonNull IModule module) {
044    return InternalModelSource.instance(module);
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Get the descriptor for a
049   * {@link gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ISource.SourceType#EXTERNAL}
050   * source with as associated resource.
051   *
052   * @param staticContext
053   *          the static Metapath context to use for compiling Metapath
054   *          expressions in this source
055   *
056   * @return the source descriptor
057   */
058  @NonNull
059  static ISource externalSource(@NonNull StaticContext staticContext) {
060    return ExternalSource.instance(staticContext);
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Get the type of source.
065   *
066   * @return the type
067   */
068  @NonNull
069  ISource.SourceType getSourceType();
070
071  /**
072   * Get the resource where the constraint was defined, if known.
073   *
074   * @return the resource or {@code null} if the resource is not known
075   */
076  @Nullable
077  URI getSource();
078
079  /**
080   * Get the static Metapath context to use when compiling Metapath expressions.
081   *
082   * @return the static Metapath context
083   */
084  @NonNull
085  StaticContext getStaticContext();
086}
